item.title: BE
item.description: score:150 Chances: Bloom Energy Inc. has been awarded up to $75 million in tax credits by the Department of Energy, Department of Treasury, and the Internal Revenue Service under the Qualifying Advanced Energy Project 48C initiative, which will enable the company to invest in operational efficiency and expand its capacity.
